attributes.action: Stop / Limit the approvals of Tier 1 ( General ) Highly skilled Migration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current UK Unemployment levels are 12 year high.
There should be a limit or temporary hold on Tier 1 ( General ) Work permits approvals. 
The job market is struggling and lot of people are looking for work. Is there a point bringing an immigrant and offering them a job ?
The Tier 1 Application approval time is currently 3 weeks which is forcing lot of people around the globe to come to UK and work. 
Why the Home office is not doing anything to control immgiration ? Do they really want the immigrants or the £ 750 fee they charge to the applicants.
Hence we strongly believe there should be a Temporary hold on Tier 1 approvals.
